title: Goyang Stadium
text: The Goyang Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Goyang">Goyang</a>, <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and was the home ground of <a href="Goyang%20Zaicro%20FC">Goyang Zaicro FC</a> of the <a href="K%20League%20Challenge">K League Challenge</a> between 2013 and 2016. The stadium holds 41,311 people and was built in 2003. It is occasionally used for matches of the <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20football%20team">South Korea national football team</a>.
